select * from ( select id,parent_id,`value`,`name`,remark,create_time,pycode,pyname,state,`order`,#{pid} as ppid, (SELECT `name` FROM sys_account WHERE id=t3.`create_id`) AS createName, (SELECT `name` FROM sys_dict WHERE id=t3.`parent_id`) AS parentName from (select id,parent_id,`value`,`name`,remark,create_time,pycode,state,pyname,`order`,create_id,if(find_in_set(parent_id, @pid) > 0, @pid := concat(@pid, ',', id), 0) as childId from ( select id,parent_id,`value`,`name`,remark,pycode,pyname,create_time,state,create_id,`order` from sys_dict t order by id) t1, (select @pid := #{pid} ) t2) t3 where childId != 0 ) t4 where 1=1 ORDER BY parent_id ASC,`order` ASC
SELECT `value`,`name`,`order`,remark,parent_id AS parentId FROM sys_dict WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT `id`,`name`,remark,parent_id AS parentId FROM sys_dict WHERE id in(${value})
